message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its quality and features. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're trying to get a good deal, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'm counteroffering at $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit away from my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money. I'm counteroffering at $110, which is as low as I'm willing to go.
